title: Video: DEMS – Christabel
content:
Penned after a poem of the same title, this elegant new track from DEMS comes accompanied by a beautifully shot video.

Following the narrative of the poem, a picturesque young girl finds herself lost in the woods, before finding solace in a stranger. Equally as mystical and demanding of repeated plays as the song itself, it’s pop music with a wondrous fairytale twist. Check out Christabel below, a free download from the DEMS website come next year, oh and if you know either of the girls in the video, send them my number….
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
